Explore the current consensus results below. To change the preferred
ranking system, select an option from the `Rank` button. If you wish to
change the strategies viewed, select an option from the `View` button.

## Damaged Cell Detection Strategies

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Interactive results table
library(DT)

# Results in csv format
data <- read.csv("./data/final-results.csv", sep = ";")

# Return the table

datatable(
  data,
  options = list(
    paging = FALSE,
    lengthChange = FALSE,
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('colvis', 'csv', 'excel'),
    columnDefs = list(
      list(targets = "_all", width = "150px")
    )
  ),
  colnames = c("Outlier detection" = "Outlier.detection",
               "Damage focus" = "Damage.focus"),
  extensions = 'Buttons'
)

```
